review: Being an avid chromecast user, I was a bit skeptical about the Fire TV Stick. However, after a month of use, I have found myself pleasantly surprised. Watching Netflix and Prime Instant Video on this device are great. The remote is top notch and I find myself using it much more than I expected. The only reason I'm docking this product a star is I have had some issues with the youtube app apparently crashing and/or freezing up my Fire TV Stick, which I have never had happen on my Chromecast. This is definitely a worthwhile purchase if you're looking for a streaming stick and a must-have for watching Prime Instant Video, but if you prefer controlling a streaming stick with your phone I would probably go with the chromecast.

review: Very Disappointing! I bought this to watch Amazon Prime videos. This is a bad product. Constantly stops while buffering and sometimes the picture freezes and you still hear the sound track.
